summary: This is a memorandum from the Southern District of New York requesting authorization to submit a witness immunity request for a witness in case number 2018O1618. The document shows internal DOJ approval processes for granting immunity to a witness.
keyFacts: A witness immunity request was submitted on September 22, 2021 for case number 2018O1618
The request required approval from the United States Attorney's office in the Southern District of New York
The document shows internal DOJ procedures for authorizing witness immunity under USAM 9-23.000
The witness name appears to be redacted or referenced only by case number
The document indicates ongoing investigative or prosecutorial activity related to the Epstein case in 2021
